author: jlaskowski
msg: Fix for a very subtle (and annoying) issue I introduced a couple of days ago. Special thanks go to Dain who made me aware of it. Thanks Dain!

author: mloenko
msg: fix and regression test for jsr/ret processing, including HARMONY-3862 (A subroutine splits execution into several ret instructions)

author: ningjiang
msg: removed the implementor element from jaxws:server

author: erodriguez
msg: Added an error check for the protocol version number.

author: psteitz
msg: Changed behavior to allow Connection, Statement, PreparedStatement,
CallableStatement and ResultSet to be closed multiple times. The first time
close is called the resource is closed and any subsequent calls have no effect.
This behavior is required as per the JavaDocs for these classes. Also added
tests for closing all types multiple times and updated any tests that
incorrectly assert that a resource can not be closed more then once.
